title: Gingered roast pork
ingredients: ['900 g (2 lb) boned loin of pork without skin, trimmed of fat', '3 dessert apples', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '75 g (2½ oz) ready-to-eat prunes, chopped', '75 g (2½ oz) gingernut biscuits, crushed', '1 egg yolk', '300 ml (10 fl oz) chicken stock', '200 ml (7 fl oz) dry white wine', '4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '900 g (2 lb) parsnips, quartered', '1 tbsp clear honey', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) shallots', 'salt and pepper', 'Apple sauce', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) cooking apples, peeled, cored and chopped', '2.5 cm (1 in) piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '2 tbsp caster sugar']
